title: Red Bull Ready to Open Wallet for Next Tour de France Winner: ‘If There is a Top Rider Maybe We Can Sign Them’
content:
Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe is looking for its next Tour de France challenger as it plants seeds for future: 'Consistency already from 2025 and beyond.'
